General.Name: CMUV Bancorp
General.Description: CMUV Bancorp operates as the bank holding company for Community Valley Bank that provides financial services to individuals and businesses in California. The company offers checking, money market, and savings accounts; and lending and investment products. It also provides construction and land development, commercial real estate and other, commercial and industrial, and consumer loan products, as well as online and mobile banking services. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in El Centro, California.
General.Address: 1443 West Main Street, El Centro, CA, United States, 92243
